metadata.title: CVE-2024-49394 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In mutt and neomutt the In-Reply-To email header field is not protected bycryptographic signing which allows an attacker to reuse an unencrypted butsigned email message to impersonate the original sender.

criterions.comment: mutt package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
